title: Twilight Sugar Cat
alternative_title: Twilight Sugar Cat ; Yoiyami Sugar Cat ; 宵闇シュガーキャット ; 近夜黃昏的Sugar cat
status: Twilight Sugar Cat ; Yoiyami Sugar Cat ; 宵闇シュガーキャット ; 近夜黃昏的Sugar cat
description:
Description :
        A super-elite office worker, Kayahara, does not want to hire any more female housekeepers. Every time he hires, it ends with her confessing her love to him, which is just annoying. And Kayahara does not have good experience with ex-girlfriends. So, when he finds a male housekeeper on the internet, he jumps at the chance to try. Kayahara is pleased to find that the new housekeeper, Sho, is a good cook, and a cat drawing on his message card is so cute. A few weeks later, Sho finds a vibrator under the bed. Kayahara does not know its existence as the toy belongs to his ex-girlfriend. He is embarrassed when Sho hands it out to him, but at the same time he notices something at Sho's reaction. Kayahara starts to wonder if Sho is a gay. And he starts to imagine that Sho might use that item to mastu*****...+
